title: Correct file ownership
body: When you installed your webserver, a dedicated user was automatically created on your system. On nearly all systems it's `www-data`, but it can also be `nginx`, `apache`, `www`, or something else. The `chmod -R` command can be used to recursively change ownership of a directory and its contents. Replace `/var/www/html` with the path to your NamelessMC installation directory.
